description:
From the top-rated & easy-to-use puggleware News app (with over 49,000 downloads!) emerges the next generation of our handy little app, packed with features our users have requested over the months!
TONS of news feeds and websites to choose from! (see partial list below)

Keep up with the latest headlines, sports, business, celebrity gossip, tech/science news, arts, fashion, jokes, comics and more from your favorite sources!
Found something you want to share? Tap to email, post to Facebook or Myspace, text/SMS it!

Choose from a list of over 400 suggested U.S. news sources, plus Canadian news, UK news, and news in Spanish.
Add your own feeds or recommend new sources for us to add to the App.

** New in Versions 1.5 & 1.6: predefined email fix for webOS 2; improved feed handling, ability to update individual feeds, new flick gestures and keyboard shortcuts for faster navigation; better story sorting & shows dates; 
new "quick view" for Full Story button; new 'Copy' to clipboard options; new image view and zoom features;
updated styling, fonts, menus, and landscape mode!

Here's a partial list of the included feeds:
CNN, USA Today, MSNBC, Wall Street Journal, Fast Company, Washington Post, Fox News, Chicago Tribune, New York Times, Los Angeles Times, Boston Herald, Las Vegas Review-Journal, Denver Post, Baltimore Sun, National Public Radio, BBC News, Reuters, Business Wire, Popular Science, Google News, Yahoo Top Stories, MTV News, Oprah Winfrey Show, TMZ, People Magazine, Entertainment Tonight, US Magazine, National Enquirer, Dilbert, The Onion, Comedy Central Joke of the Day, Jokes 4 All, Fox Sports, CBS Sports, ESPN Top Headlines, ESPN NFL, ESPN NBA, ESPN MLB, ESPN NHL, ESPN Soccer, ESPNU, ESPN College Basketball, ESPN College Football, Slashdot, Engadget, Gizmodo, Digg, Ars Technica, Yahoo Technology Stories, Daily Dish, Nick Carr, Huffington Post, CNN, CNN Sports, CNNMoney.com, CNN Politics, CNBC, Glamour
